steps.name: Drag mouse cursor on the Giris Yap icon and click on the Giris Yap button
I enter a valid email and click the Devam button
I enter a valid password and click the Giris Yap button
I drag mouse on the "ÇOCUK & BEBEK" after "KIZ ÇOCUK " and click "Mont ve Kaban" from the submenu
I select "5-6 Yaş" for the Beden filter
I select "6 Yaş" for the Beden filter
I select "6-7 Yaş" for the Beden filter
I select "BEJ" for the Renk filter
I click on the sorting dropdown and select "En çok satanlar"
I click on the "4" product in the list
I select an available size for the product
I get the product name and color
I click the Sepete Ekle button
I navigate to the Sepetim page
I verify the product name, color, quantity and price are correct
I click on the heart icon on the product card to add it to favorites
I navigate to the Favorilerim page
I verify the previously favorited product is listed using its name
Close the browser

name: Online shopping process on LC Waikiki website
